Regulation Name(s): Device to detect and identify nucleic acid targets in respiratory specimens from microbial agents that cause the SARS-CoV-2 respiratory infection and other microbial agents when in a multi-target test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioFire COVID-19 Test 2, a qualitative multiplexed RT-PCR assay for detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs using FilmArray 2.0 and Torch instruments.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative RT-PCR assay to detect SARS-CoV-2 RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic individuals suspected of COVID-19, for use with BioFire FilmArray 2.0 and Torch systems, by trained laboratory professionals.
